articles.author: David Pierce, Jon Porter
articles.title: OnePlus' Nord Buds wireless earbuds: calls and music for $40 - The Verge
articles.description: OnePlus’ new Nord Buds earbuds offer Dolby Atmos support, fast charging, and long battery life for a surprisingly low price. They’ve been announced alongside two new European entries to the Nord lineup of smartphones.
articles.content:
Plus, two new Nord phones are coming to Europe soon
OnePlus latest set of wireless earbuds is also the first to get its Nord branding, which the company uses for its cheaper products. The new Nord B… [+2593 chars]

articles.title: Google’s I/O Conference Offers Modest Vision of the Future - The New York Times
articles.description: Artificial intelligence is being woven into an array of the company’s products. But the change — for now — is subtle.
